text: Žarko Peševski () (born 11 April 1991) is a Macedonian handball player for TVB 1898 Stuttgart and the North Macedonian national team.EHF profile2017 World Championship roster2019 World Men's Handball Championship roster ==References== ==External links== * Category:1991 births Category:Living people Category:Macedonian male handball players Category:Sportspeople from Skopje Category:Expatriate handball players Category:Macedonian expatriate sportspeople in Germany Category:Macedonian expatriate sportspeople in Ukraine Category:HC Motor Zaporizhia players Category:Handball-Bundesliga players
title: Žarko Peševski
